BR_text.BRsummary: Add additional meta fields for FAQ-QA APIs
BR_text.BRdescription:
I couldn't figure out how to get additional meta fields also returned in the results response.
 Currently, the results object contains
 <denchmark-code>question, 
 answers.answer
 answers.question
 answer.probability
 ...
 
 </denchmark-code>
 
 How do I get other fields from the same document? I think that should come under "meta" but I am not aware of how to specify that? Is there any environment variable?
 Originally posted by @sonnylaskar in #101 (comment)

comments_0.comment_text:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sonnylaskar>@sonnylaskar</denchmark-link>
 , the metadata is now added by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/pull/106>#106</denchmark-link>
  for FAQ-QA APIs.
